description:
Prince Niari, who`s defining trait is his womanizing nature, kidnaps the three princesses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bara no Kimi Prince Ayakashi no Hohoemi Midarezaki no Koto
El príncipe de las rosas, una sonrisa muy sospechosa.
The Rose Prince, the Charming, Winning Smile
薔薇の君プリンスあやかしの微笑み乱れ咲き のこと
